name: Snek (simpu)
description:
Snek A classic snake game with a twist

Instead of controlling a snake with the arrow keys, use arrow tiles to control the snake.

Drag and drop from the marked area to spawn the respective arrow tile

Snake will change it's direction depending on the arrow tile.

Snake will ignore the arrow tiles facing in the opposite direction.

Snake will eat the apples and grows

Snake will die on collision with itself

Passing an arrow tile will deduct 1 point from bonus score of next apple, so try to eat apples using minimum number of tiles

Your objective: Eat! Grow! Repeat!

Note: This game is a jam submission for https://itch.io/jam/brainjammarch2021

Credits:

Game Programmed by Utkarsh (simpu)

Art by Mangal

Background music is "Prayers" from Admiral Bob. Taken from here

Sound effects are from Kenny

Font is "Poppins" taken from here

Made with ❤️ in Unity
